International applicants whose native language is not English must submit scores from the Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL), International English Language Testing System (IELTS), or Pearson Test of English-Academic (PTE-A). A minimum TOEFL score of 92 (iBT) is required. A minimum IELTS score of 7.0 is required. A minimum PTE-A score of 63 is required. International applicants whose native language is not English must submit scores from the Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL). Minimum scores of 580 (paper-based), 237 (computer-based), or 92 (Internet-based) are required. The International English Language Testing System (IELTS) is also accepted; a minimum score of 7.0 is required. Applicants with TOEFL scores between 80-91 (internet-based) or IELTS scores between 6.5-7.0 may be admitted conditionally and will be required to complete prescribed English language courses in their first semester of study.
